alert.note: Alert for Allen; Evangeline; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Southern Acadia; St. Landry; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:31PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Cameron, Jefferson Davis, Evangeline, Acadia, southeastern Calcasieu, northwestern Vermilion, central St. Landry and southeastern Allen Parishes through 430 PM CDT... At 331 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Grand Prairie to near Richard to near Lake Arthur to 6 miles southeast of Grand Chenier. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Crowley, Eunice, Jennings, Rayne, Ville Platte, Church Point, Mamou, Welsh, Lake Arthur, Basile, Iota, Gueydan, Elton, Mermentau, Palmetto, Rockefeller Wildlife Range, Hayes, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge and Morrow. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 50 and 90. Interstate 49 between mile markers 15 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Evangeline; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Southern Acadia; St. Landry; Upper Vermilion
